data.message: I cannot be the only one who can't stand the click/typing noise when clicking to read and comment on comments. please get rid of this feature or at least allow us to turn it off in settings somehow. it's beyond annoying especially if multiple people comment and having to hear it every time you want to read their notification.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Joshua. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something specific we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2giNX2l. -Brittany
Why the fake death notices for celebrities?Facebook
Be nice to send a voice to someone and not type.
